title: SJVN Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 13 Assistant and Other Posts
description: The Satluj Jal Vidyut Nigam Limited (SJVN) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 13 Assistant, Workmen Trainee Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, and 08th can apply for the SJVN Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, a...
